 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּוָה‎</span>] **verb Hiph\`il** probably ==pain, wound== (figurative) (Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (often), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּוָא‎</span> (rare) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּהָא‎</span> <lookup onclick="bdbabb('Tg')"><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ᵑ7‎</span><sup>**J**</sup></lookup>, all ***repent***); — ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַתְווּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּקְדוֺשׁ יִשׂ‎</span> [[Ps.78.41|Ps 78:41]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְנַסּוּ‎</span>) ***the Holy OnE of Israel they painEd*** ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">παρώξυναν</span>).
